description: This light and healthy brown rice salad is delicious with savoury miso and crisp green veggies.
name: Miso Brown Rice & Greens Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice according pack instructions, add the edamame and tenderstem broccoli for the final 3 minutes of cooking and drain. Set aside in a bowl. Whisk the miso, ginger, vinegar, maple syrup and most of the sesame oil together in a small bowl.
Heat a drizzle of sesame oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the garlic, chilli and spring onions for 12 minutes. Stir in the kale and cook for 2 minutes.
Tip the spring onions and kale into the rice mix. Stir in the chopped coriander and pour over the dressing. Leave to cool or serve warm.
